An Infernal Mage (elite) is an elite version of the Infernal Mage. If on a Slayer assignment, an elite Infernal Mage is guaranteed to spawn; otherwise, elite monsters have a spawn rate of 1 in 1,000. Elite spawn rates can be further increased with the use of fellstalk incense sticks and tier 1 luck.

  • 2 Drops

  • 3 Update history

Names[edit | edit source]

The elite versions have varying names, with a randomly generated prefix and suffix.

Prefix Infernal mage Suffix
Cruel of Death
Dangerous of Doom
Infamous of Fear
Monstrous of Pain
Notorious of Peril
Powerful of Suffering
Renowned

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.
Item Quantity Rarity GE price High Alch

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • patch 12 February 2024 (Update):
    • Rebalanced several low level monsters that were harder to kill than intended
  • update 27 July 2015 (Update):
    • Added to game.
